entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:59 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: E 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
